content:
The 8x8 inch medium size is a popular choice for a reason. It's a great size for creating a beautiful, compact photo album that's easy to handle and display.

Now that you've decided on the size, you can start thinking about the design and layout of your album. Mixbook offers a range of templates, themes, and design tools to help you create a stunning album. You can choose from various layouts, backgrounds, and embellishments to make your album truly unique.

Here are a few tips to keep in mind when designing your album:

* **Keep it simple**: Don't overcrowd your pages with too many photos or embellishments. Leave some white space to create a clean and elegant design.
* **Choose a theme**: Select a theme that fits the occasion or the style of your photos. This will help you stay focused and ensure your album has a cohesive look.
* **Use high-quality photos**: Make sure your photos are high-resolution and well-lit. This will ensure they look great in print.
* **Add captions**: Consider adding captions or quotes to your photos to add context and make the album more personal.

If you need any help or inspiration, Mixbook has a range of resources available, including design tutorials, blog posts, and customer support.

Now that you've got your size and design ideas in place, you're ready to start creating your album! Have fun with the design process, and I'm sure your mom will love the final product.
